input.name: ctl89

div.p:
COVID-19 Update: All Lamar CISD schools and facilities will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
For all updates and remote learning information, please click here.

li.a: Bullying, School Safety and Crisis Resources

div.p: In response to the rapidly evolving COVID-19 situation in Fort Bend County, and to prevent community spread of the virus, Lamar CISD has closed all schools and facilities for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. During the suspension of normal school operations, remote learning continues and Lamar CISD will always be here to support our families, staff and community. Please check this website often for updates, information and resources to assist you.

h2.a: Lamar CISD Celebrates Librarians' Week April 20 - 24
Educational Administrative Professionals Week is April 20 - 24
